attributes.action: Wear a placard round his neck which reads"I stole your old age"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Gordon Brown is such a useless thieving git and plundered pension funds and wasted all the money he must wear a placard which reads "I stole your old age"

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
